content: p1 k1 around final round has 8 sts between markers 64 sts total decrease every round as follows round 13 *k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 ssp repeat from * around round 14 *k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k2tog repeat from * around round 15 *p1 k1 p1 k1 ssp repeat from * around round 16 *p1 k1 p1 k2tog repeat from * around round 17 *k1 p1 ssp repeat from * around round 18 *k1 k2tog repeat from * around removing markers as you come to them round 19 *ssp k2tog repeat from * around 8 sts total cut yarn with a long tail thread tail through all 8 sts then through the first 5 sts and draw tight weave top end in on side of hat that will be inside when worn weave beginning end in inside cuff cables and moss - worsted weight watch cap-20220411 written instructions for charts a and b chart a cable round 1 *k1 p1 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 repeat round 1 round 5 *k1 p1 work twisted 3-st cable with center purl as follows move next st to a cn 1st st and hold to front of the work move next st to second cn 2nd st and hold to back of the work k1tbl next st on the lhn 3rd st move st on back cn to the lhn and purl move st on front cn to the lhn and k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 repeat round 1 chart b moss stitch rnds 1 and 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 2 repeat round 1 rnds 3 and 4 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 4 repeat round 3 decrease chart reference 250 japanese knitting stitches hitomi shida translated by gayle roehm tuttle 2018 pg 155 twisted 3-st cable with center purl cables and moss - worsted weight watch cap-20220411
